article.headline: VA Commonwealth 75, Old Dominion 71
article.story: RICHMOND, Va. (AP) -- Nick George scored 18 of his 27 points in the second half as Virginia Commonwealth overcame a slow start to beat Old Dominion 75-71 Saturday evening. The Rams (10-8, 6-3 Colonial Athletic Association) took their largest lead 71-60 with 1:33 remaining. But VCU missed 6-of-8 free throw attempts down the stretch allowing the Monarchs to close within 3. The Monarchs (18-3, 8-1) had an 18-5 lead with 13:11 remaining in the first half following a four-point play by Kiah Thomas. But the Monarchs missed 22 of their next 27 field goal attempts as the Rams outscored them 38-19 to take a 43-37 lead with 14:07 remaining in the game. The Monarchs held on to a 32-29 halftime lead, but the Rams ran off a 14-5 spurt -- seven by George -- to open the second half. Old Dominion took it no closer than one. The Rams have beaten Old Dominion ten straight times and VCU coach Jeff Caple is 6-0 against the Monarchs. The loss snapped a seven-game Old Dominion winning streak and handed the Monarchs their first Colonial Athletic Association loss of the season. George's 27 points were a career high. B.A. Walker added 16 and Michael Doles, 13. Isaiah Hunter led Old Dominion with 19 points. Thomas had a season-high 16, Valdas Vasylius added 15 and Alex Loughton added 12.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
